meta.query: #全红婵不参加全运会单人项目#

response.share_text: #全红婵不参加全运会单人项目#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.query: #全红婵不参加全运会单人项目#
response.msg:
嗯，用户问的是关于全红婵为什么不参加全运会单人项目的事情。这个问题看起来挺热的，因为搜索结果里有好多讨论。

我看了一下这些搜索结果，发现事情是这样的：全红婵本来计划参加三个项目，但最后只报了团体双人10米台和双人10米台两项，没参加单人项目。主要原因好像是她的脚踝有旧伤，今年5月就因为距腓前韧带损伤退过赛。单人项目赛程太密集了，48小时内要跳5次，她的身体可能吃不消。

有意思的是，团队这个决定挺聪明的。让全红婵专注双人项目，既能减轻负担（双人动作少些），又能保证广东队夺金点，还给了队友蒋林静、谢佩铃机会。其实长远看是为了保护她，毕竟洛杉矶奥运会也就三年后了。

不过这事也引起了一些争议。有人质疑为什么不早点公布消息，害得买了单人项目门票的观众退不了票。还有些人猜是不是因为全红婵现在状态打不过陈芋汐，但我觉得这种说法没啥根据。

全红婵的赛程现在很明确：11月2日团体双人决赛，11月6日双人项目预赛和决赛。她搭档都是王伟莹，两人配合应该不错。单人项目就由陈芋汐、张家齐和全红婵的队友们去争了。

总的来说，这个决定是出于运动员健康考虑的专业选择。全红婵才18岁，运动生涯还很长，保护身体确实比硬拼一块全运会金牌更重要。


根据最新官方信息及多方报道，全红婵在2025年第十五届全运会（大湾区全运会）中**最终仅参加女子双人10米跳台和女子团体双人10米跳台两项赛事，未报名女子单人10米跳台项目**。以下是综合分析：
### 一、**参赛情况确认**
1. **具体项目调整**
- 全红婵的最终参赛项目为：
- **女子团体双人10米跳台**（搭档王伟莹）：11月2日决赛。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [1, 22, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "网易体育频道", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228218628183618", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "北青体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251380711554", "index": 29, "label": ""}], "name": "网易体育频道", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/a45a7f57ly8hj8vgpv7vwj20go0godhb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=wOi5rrL9M9", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "vType": 3}}```
- **女子双人10米跳台**（搭档王伟莹）：11月6日预赛及决赛。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [1, 42, 45], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228229407279437", "index": 45, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "网易体育频道", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "纵情球场", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228224667975884", "index": 42, "label": ""}], "name": "央视体育", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/b2664ecdly8gdi6oss5r8j20go0gomxb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=Yjo%2BVHMLCM", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228229407279437", "vType": 3}}```
- **未报名项目**：女子单人10米跳台（原定11月8日预赛/半决赛、11月10日决赛）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [30, 45], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "盛夏的金瑰", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251103364367", "index": 30, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228229407279437", "index": 45, "label": ""}]}}```
- 广东队改由蒋林静、谢佩玲出战女子单人10米跳台。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [22, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "北青体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251380711554", "index": 29, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228218628183618", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "北青体育", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006SkcCCly8h8v8sirp6tj30u00u00ue.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=xc%2Faq9Pusf", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251380711554", "vType": 3}}```

2. **调整时间线**
- **10月中旬**：多家媒体（如北京日报）报道其计划参加团体、双人、单人三项。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [4, 51], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "北京日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223595347544977", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "红山晚报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224856904011894", "index": 51, "label": ""}], "name": "北京日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0024aA4lly8i51bp1z4bcj60go0goq3g02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=%2BYg6fKsmSf", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223595347544977", "vType": 3}}```
- **10月25日**：有账号辟谣“不参加单人项目”的说法，称信息不实。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [3], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225547645064355", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}], "name": "国球人生", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/006ehHTSly8gxz64icyxoj30go0go75c.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=ZYZ6Kskmr%2F", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225547645064355", "vType": 0}}```
- **11月1日**：全运会官网更新名单，确认其退出单人项目。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [1, 45], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "网易体育频道", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220179809307", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228229407279437", "index": 45, "label": ""}]}}```
央视体育
国球人生
红山晚报

### 二、**退赛核心原因**
1. **伤病恢复与身体保护**
- **脚踝旧伤未愈**：2025年5月因距腓前韧带损伤伴关节腔积液退出全国冠军赛及世锦赛，虽经针灸、高压氧舱等治疗，但尚未完全康复。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [6, 16, 40], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "I毅世-淇缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228223111627806", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "邪恶男主角", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228244506511942", "index": 40, "label": ""}], "name": "I毅世-淇缘", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/007rSltply8i03tfs9znjj30u00u0abp.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=uO0ssRJ8KP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "vType": 0}}```
- **赛程强度过大**：单人项目需48小时内完成预赛、半决赛、决赛共5跳，高强度动作可能加重伤病。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [19, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "仓鼠看书ing", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228238580224487", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "剁咸厘米", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251519124782", "index": 27, "label": ""}]}}```
- **身体发育关键期**：18岁的身高体重变化影响技术稳定性（如207C动作），需减少负荷专注调整。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [6, 40], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "I毅世-淇缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "邪恶男主角", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228244506511942", "index": 40, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **团队战略考量**
- **保障双人项目冲金**：与王伟莹搭档双人跳台是广东队重点夺金点，减少单人赛可集中体能和训练资源。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [6, 27, 50], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "I毅世-淇缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "剁咸厘米", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251519124782", "index": 27, "label": ""}, {"name": "倒流的磁带", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228228789932310", "index": 50, "label": ""}]}}```
- **梯队建设需要**：为队友蒋林静、谢佩玲提供大赛机会，后者曾获世锦赛混双金牌。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [6, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "I毅世-淇缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "北青体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251380711554", "index": 29, "label": ""}]}}```
- **长远目标优先**：教练组强调“运动生涯很长”，保护健康是为2028年洛杉矶奥运会蓄力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [6, 16], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "I毅世-淇缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "国球人生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228223111627806", "index": 16, "label": ""}]}}```
倒流的磁带

### 三、**争议与公众反应**
1. **赛前信息不透明争议**
- 部分观众质疑组委会“捂消息卖票”，因单人项目门票售罄后突然调整名单，导致退票困难。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [19, 21, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "仓鼠看书ing", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228238580224487", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "清晨beauty", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228237783305956", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "正五星红旗", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228245842660314", "index": 35, "label": ""}]}}```
- 媒体前期宣传“三金王”噱头（如10月报道“全红婵陈芋汐三线对决”），与实际赛程不符。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [43, 53, 54], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻Knews", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227597064835249", "index": 43, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "猫猫叫小宝", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222649397510956", "index": 53, "label": ""}, {"name": "足球看元芳推荐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222751897912286", "index": 54, "label": ""}], "name": "看看新闻Knews", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.410.410.50/6e05a6daly1h8vg7kmg7ej20be0bemxf.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=2hTfKiTEwu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227597064835249", "vType": 3}}```

2. **竞技状态猜测**
- 少数观点认为其因“状态不及陈芋汐”退赛（陈芋汐2025年世锦赛包揽3金，世界杯三胜全红婵），但主流分析强调伤病是主因。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [6, 20, 26, 40, 44], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "纵情球场", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227743736498133", "index": 44, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "I毅世-淇缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "不爱吃胡萝卜的吃瓜人", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228244655671136", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "北丐聊球", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251947469720", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "邪恶男主角", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228244506511942", "index": 40, "label": ""}], "name": "纵情球场", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/95a9b0f3ly8hn5nggt8ysj20u00u0ac5.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=wjAc9YFzyZ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227743736498133", "vType": 0}}```
- 粉丝呼吁理性看待：“健康比金牌重要”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [32, 39], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "KZJYSML", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228249745719723", "index": 32, "label": ""}, {"name": "你是谁啊啊啊啊你", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228244592760015", "index": 39, "label": ""}]}}```
看看新闻Knews
足球看元芳推荐

### 四、**赛事影响与未来展望**
- **女子单人台竞争格局**：陈芋汐成夺冠最大热门，张家齐、蒋林静等具备冲击奖牌实力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [26, 29, 44], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "北丐聊球", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251947469720", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "北青体育", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251380711554", "index": 29, "label": ""}, {"name": "纵情球场", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227743736498133", "index": 44, "label": ""}]}}```
- **全红婵复出意义**：时隔183天重返赛场（上次参赛为5月世界杯总决赛），双人项目表现将检验其恢复进度。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [47, 49, 52], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "玉哥的日常", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228192904253149", "index": 49, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "星晨菜行", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228220714848666", "index": 47, "label": ""}, {"name": "潇壕", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228203682565088", "index": 52, "label": ""}], "name": "玉哥的日常", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.800.800.50/e5216294ly8hze5kzb9c1j20m80m842m.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762006685&ssig=LvzuZThsMU", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228192904253149", "vType": 0}}```
- **职业规划**：团队明确将“稳步恢复、备战2028奥运”作为核心目标，此次调整属阶段性策略。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 36, "data": {"num": [6, 27, 50], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "I毅世-淇缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251307839371", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "剁咸厘米", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228251519124782", "index": 27, "label": ""}, {"name": "倒流的磁带", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228228789932310", "index": 50, "label": ""}]}}```
星晨菜行

### 总结
全红婵退出全运会单人项目是伤病管理与长期职业规划的综合决策，旨在通过双人赛事逐步恢复状态，同时避免加重旧伤风险。公众期待应转向其与王伟莹的双人跳台表现，这既是对广东队冲金的支持，也是观察其竞技状态的重要窗口。

share_info.tips: #全红婵不参加全运会单人项目#的相关内容，来智搜看看
